mapper.insert: INSERT INTO authentication(authNo, userId, apiKey, loginTime, userLevel) VALUES (auth_authNo_SEQ.nextVal, #{userId}, #{apiKey}, sysdate, #{userLevel})
INSERT INTO authenticationHistory(hisNo, userId, apiKey, loginTime, userLevel) VALUES (authHistory_hisNo_SEQ.nextVal, #{userId}, #{apiKey}, sysdate, #{userLevel})
mapper.update: UPDATE authentication SET apiKey = '' WHERE userId = #{userId} AND apiKey = #{apiKey}
UPDATE authenticationHistory SET logoutTime = sysdate WHERE userId = #{userId} AND apiKey = #{apiKey}
